question: This country will host 5th Global Conference on Cyber Space (GCCS)-2017.
explanation: The 5th Global Conference on Cyber Space (GCCS) will be held in New Delhi from November 23-24, 2017. The GCCS is one of the world's Largest conference on Cyber Space and related issues. The theme of the conference will be "Cyber for all: An Inclusive, Sustainable, Developmental, Safe and Secure Cyberspace". India is the 2nd Asian country, after South Korea, who will be organizing such conference.
